display_long_description:
FLY LIKE A KID, FEEL LIKE A PILOT!
Volara is a flight adventure game where you soar through amazing worlds just by moving your hand. Explore beautiful environments, earn badges, discover secrets, overcome challenging boss fights and become a Top Pilot!

ADVENTURE AWAITS, UNLOCK NEW AIRCRAFTS
Wander through the skies alongside friendly toys, navigate intricate tiki mazes, or dare to enter the depths of a treacherous volcano. But that’s just the beginning. As you progress, you’ll unlock new planes and worlds to explore. Soon you might even reach the cosmos!

FUN & INTUITIVE FLYING CONTROLS
When we were kids, we used to play with toy airplanes, the interface was very simple: our hands! Get ready for the most intuitive flying experience you´ve ever had. With a simple twist of the wrist, you can control your plane and fly anywhere. It feels amazing, experience true freedom!

EPIC BOSS FIGHTS!
No true adventure is complete without the thrill and challenge of an epic boss fight. In Volara, you'll earn your wings as a top aviator by facing the danger head on. Will you rise to the occasion as a Master Pilot? The sky's the limit!"
